content: Nadeem Nemi is a right-handed male retiree with a history of bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome, right cubital tunnel syndrome, and bilateral thumb CMC joint arthritis. He denies any numbness or tingling. He describes functional limitation related to his thumbs. He received bilateral thumb CMC joint injections during this visit. No prior trauma or acute injury was reported.
